Pre-Game Insights: Chicago Cubs are 68-66 this season and have won six of their last seven games.
Washington Nationals are 61-73 this year and have won three of their last four games.
Chicago Cubs' starting pitcher Shota Imanaga has a 3.08 ERA and a 1.06 WHIP.
Washington Nationals' starting pitcher Jake Irvin has a 3.80 ERA and a 1.16 WHIP.
Chicago Cubs have won eight of their last nine road games against teams with a losing record.
Washington Nationals have lost seven of their last eight night games against National League opponents.
Chicago Cubs have covered the run line in each of their last four night games against National League opponents.
Washington Nationals have failed to cover the run line in seven of their last nine games against the Cubs following a win.
